lang.directions: Cliquez sur un point rouge dans le schéma ou sur l’un des items contenus dans le menu « Equipement » pour découvrir les informations relatives au lubrifiant Mobil correspondant. Pour parcourir l’ensemble du schéma, cliquez et déplacez la souris ou utilisez les flèches de déplacement situées sur votre clavier d’ordinateur.
lang.refineYourSearchWithLooble: Affiner votre recherche avec le guide de sélection Looble
lang.emailPageLink: Lien pour envoyer un message électronique
lang.touchModeQuestion: Il apparaît que vous êtes en train d’utiliser une tablette ou un appareil à touches tactiles. Souhaitez-vous utiliser une interface tactile optimisée ?
lang.yesUseTheTouchVersion: Oui, je préfère utiliser la version tactile

products.name: Mobilith SHC™
products.information: High-performance synthetic greases for lubrication of bearings
products.benefits: Excellent wear protection of components; helps with easy start-up at low temperature; helps extend regreasing interval &#8212; helping to reduce service cost

products.name: Mobilgrease XHP™
products.information: Greases intended for wide variety of applications in severe operating conditions including many industrial sectors
products.benefits: Excellent adhesion and cohesion properties; high mechanical stability helps provide extended relubrication intervals; helps resist water intrusion; helps improve equipment reliability

products.name: Mobilith SHC™
products.information: High-performance synthetic greases for lubrication of bearings
products.benefits: Excellent wear protection of components; helps with easy start-up at low temperature; helps extend regreasing interval &#8212; helping to reduce service cost

products.name: Mobilgrease XHP™
products.information: Greases intended for wide variety of applications in severe operating conditions including many industrial sectors
products.benefits: Excellent adhesion and cohesion properties; high mechanical stability helps provide extended relubrication intervals; helps resist water intrusion; helps improve equipment reliability

products.name: Mobilgrease™ XTC
products.information: High-speed coupling grease
products.benefits: Helps maximize coupling reliability and life due to its adhesive, low bleed and high-temperature stability properties

products.name: Mobilux™ EP 111
products.information: Coupling grease
products.benefits: Helps maximize coupling reliability and life due to its low bleed and wear protection properties

products.name: Mobil SHC™ 600
products.information: Synthetic gear, bearing and circulating oil
products.benefits: Helps improve equipment productivity due to reduced unscheduled downtime and maintenance; long gear and bearing life under high-stress operating conditions; helps extend oil life; potential power consumption reduction of up to 3.6% when compared to mineral oils*<br /><br /><font size="11px">*Power consumption relates solely to the fluid performance when compared with conventional (mineral) reference oils of the same viscosity grade. The technology used provides up to 3.6% efficiency compared to the reference when tested in a worm gearbox under controlled conditions. Efficiency improvements will vary based on operating conditions and application.</font>

products.name: Mobilgear SHC™ XMP
products.information: Synthetic EP gear and bearing oils
products.benefits: Outstanding load carrying and helps minimize effects of scuffing and micropitting to assist with improving equipment reliability and life; compatible with wide range of gearbox seal materials

products.name: Mobil SHC™ Gear
products.information: Synthetic EP gear and bearing oils
products.benefits: Outstanding load carrying and anti-wear properties to assist with  improving equipment reliability and life; can replace grease in some applications; high viscosity index and low traction properties

products.name: Mobilith SHC™ 100
products.information: High-performance synthetic greases for electric motor bearings
products.benefits: Long grease life and bearing protection helping increase motor reliability

products.name: Mobil Polyrex™ EM
products.information: Premium-quality electric motor bearing grease
products.benefits: Helps extend bearing life to improve electric motor reliability

products.name: Mobil DTE 10 Excel ™
products.information: Patent-pending hydraulic fluid designed to meet the demands of modern industrial hydraulic equipment
products.benefits: Ultra keep-clean performance, long oil life and hydraulic efficiency potential helps provide maximum productivity in modern hydraulic systems

products.name: Mobil SHC Pegasus™
products.information: Leading-edge synthetic gas engine oil
products.benefits: Advanced technology helps provide a potential fuel efficiency benefit of up to 1.5% when compared with ExxonMobil's standard SAE 40 natural gas engine oils;** Keep clean performance and wear-protection to help extend component life<br /><br /><font size="11px">**The fuel efficiency of Mobil SHC Pegasus relates solely to the fluid performance when compared with ExxonMobil's standard SAE 40 natural gas engine oils. The technology used allows up to a 1.5% increase in fuel efficiency compared with Mobil Pegasus 1005 and 805 Series when tested in standard natural gas engine applications under controlled conditions. Efficiency improvements will vary based on operating conditions. The energy efficiency claim for this product is based on test results on the use of the fluid conducted in accordance with all applicable industry standards and protocols.</font>

products.name: Mobilgard™
products.information: Premium stationary diesel engine lubricants
products.benefits: High performance diesel engine lubricant, high oxidation resistance leading to longer life

products.name: Mobil Rarus™ 800
products.information: Synthetic compressor oils
products.benefits: Suitable for reciprocating and rotary screw compressor with the lower viscosity grade used in rotary screw compressors; higher viscosity grades used in reciprocating compressors help reduce deposits on valves in these compressors, reducing potential for fires and explosions compared to mineral oil products

products.name: Mobil Rarus SHC™ 1020
products.information: Synthetic rotary screw compressor oils
products.benefits: Helps extend service life; helps reduce deposits; long oil life; low maintenance costs; helps reduce wear of components

products.name: Mobil Delvac™ 1300 Super
products.information: Extra-high-performance diesel engine oils that help extend engine life in the most severe on- and off- highway applications while delivering outstanding performance in modern, high-output, low-emission engines including those with Exhaust Gas Recirculation (EGR) and After Treatment Systems with Diesel Particulate Filters (DPFs) and Diesel Oxidation Catalysts (DOCs)
products.benefits: Potential for reduced low-temperature sludge buildup and high temperature deposits; helps lower oil costs due to less make-up oil during operation; excellent low-temperature pumpability; long life of critical wear surfaces
